title: Google Trends
content:
I kinda remember this post somewhere, but can't find it...

So here: [url=http://www.google.com/trends]www.google.com/trends[/url]

And an interesting search:

[url=http://www.google.com/trends?q=commander+keen&ctab=0&geo=all&date=all]Google Trends: Commander Keen[/url]

Check the countries/regions and languages

KR; Finnish is the top language for searching Keen
LL; New Zealand is the top country searching for Keen

Now, looking at that... who comes from what city, and LL, are you from Auckland, New Zealand?


This is cool. You can also compare things. You can see what people are searching for, and compare trends; whats coming, whats going.

(P.S. Keen is slowly fading... and compare it to other topics... Keen is already pretty low on the trend charts...)Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/tough_guys_wear_pink.jpg[/img]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Google Trends
content: [quote]Quote:[hr]LL, are you from Auckland, New Zealand?[hr][/quote]No, but I imagine her ISP's computers are based there. (This is the problem with internet geolocation - not many people have their home addresses publically linked to their IP address)[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: Google Trends
content:
I don't get what this languages means in this.. I always try to use the English version of Google. And another funny thing, I don't think I've searched Google with Keen related words that often..
